inn1.comm: Javed Omar lets the first delivery he has faced in the World Cup go through to the 'keeper
fullish, just around the off stump and shapes away. Omar leans forward, gets close to the line, sees the movement away and shoulders arms
some swing out there. Starts too early in the trajectory and moves further away. Omar is not interested.
changes the length. Goes back of length, around off stump, it kicks up a touch. Omar is on the front foot, adjusts, pushes it out to cover point
in the channel outside off stump, slightly short in length, Omar lets that one fly past him.
fuller and outside off stump, Omar leans forward, pushes at it, bat away from the body, to point
rushes through the channel outside off , left alone.
Bumper. On the middle and leg stump line, Tamim ducks under
slanted across Tamim who presses forward, covers the off stump and lets it go through to the 'keeper
Nice shape away. Tamim pokes at it but it's well inside the line and there is no danger
lands outside off stump and moves further away, left alone
outside off stump, left alone again.
Classy. Omar leans forward, crashes a full-pitched delivery down the ground. Past the bowler.
shout for lbw but the point of impact was outside off stump. Omar is again on the front foot, pushes at a length-delivery, the bat comes outside the line and ball thuds into the pad.
gets into a tangle. After the first delivery, Mason has shortened the lenght. Hits the deck short of length, it kicks up and goes straight on, Omar hops up and is hit on the thigh pad
overpitched outside off and thrashed through cover. Again he gets on to the front foot - he makes his living out of that, and drives
yorker-length, on the middle stump line, Tamim pushes, the bat-handle rotates, and the ball rolls over to the off side
they steal a run. A tip to the on side and off they go.
nearly played on. Landed on a length, moves towards the off stump line, Tamim tries to punch it on the up, gets a inside-edge on to his boot
lands on the leg stump line, shapes towards middle, Tamim plays it on the up again, back down the track.
full and on the legs, flicked away to fine-leg for a single.
hits the deck, short of length, outside the off stump, goes straight on, Omar drops his wrists, withdraws the bat from the line
landed short of length, on the off stump line, cut back in and thudded into the thigh pad, Omar was surprised by the inward movement and more by the pace of the delivery.
on target. Around the off stump and pushed into covers.
length-delivery on the off and middle stump line, turned to midwicket
fuller and outside off stump, Tamim has previously freed his arms at the width but today he is in a cautious mood. Lets that one go throug to the 'keeper
fullish, almost yorker-length, on the middle and off stump line, Tamim plays it inside-out, drives through cover. Not much timing on that and he will just get a single.
full in length, on the middle stump line, Omar gets his bat in front of the pad and defends
Hello? Omar takes the aerial route. Full-pitched outside off and he drives, bottom-hand powering the stroke, to the left of mid-off
Bond sends one at the pad, Tamim tries to flick, misses and it runs off the pad, past the diving McCullum and to the boundary
yorker-length, just outside leg stump, Tamim tries to wrist it away to the on side, misses and the ball bounds off the pad, to the off side
slower one, full and on the off and middle, Tamim waits and drives it to mid-off.
nice smooth drive to mid-off. Again full in length, Tamim leans forward, left elbow high and the head over the ball.
change of pace. Shane Bond is expecting Tamim to go for his strokes but today he is a conservative mould. Just leans forward and pats it to off side
full and on the middle and off, nudged to cover.
on the middle stump line, defended on the front foot
short of length, on the leg stump line, dabbed to the on side
full-pitched on the off stump line, driven to mid-off
climbs up from short of length, on the middle and leg stump line, turned to the on side
back of length, on the middle stump line, defended again. Sedate start by Bangladesh. Looks like they are listening to Whatmore
length-delivery on the middle stump line, defended on the front foot.
full and straight, on the legs, tucked behind square-leg
beaten. In the temptation zone outside off and Omar flirts dangerously at it.
banged in short, rises up at the throat, stabbed away to the off side
full in length, around off and middle stump line, worked to point
short and outside off, left alone by Omar.

Oram hits the outside edge rightaway. From round the stumps, lands on the off stump line,holds up a touch and Tamim has a tentative poke inside the line, gets the edge, falls short of Styris and bounces awkwardly. Styris fumbles.
length-delivery, angling in from outside off, pushed to point
homing in on the off stump, Tamim is on the front foot, opens the bat-face, guides it to point.
drifts on to the pads, clipped away past square-leg
slower one, on the off and middle, Omar picks it and plays it quietly towards cover
full and on the leg and middle, Tamim tries to go inside-out, gets a inside-edge to short fine leg.
leans forward and is slightly early into his drive and ends up pushing it t owards mid-off
outside off stump and yep, you guessed it right, Omar lets it go. He is a patient man.
slower one, Bond's third iirc, outside off stump, Omar leans forward, waits, runs it down to third man
141.5 kmph, kicks up from short of length, on the middle stump line, Tamim hops up quickly and gets on top of it and defends
fuller, 143.2 kmph, on the off and middle and Tamim, as his wont, drives inside-out, through cover
length-delivery, around the off stump, played to short cover
drifts on the legs, like most subcontinental batsmen, Tamim wrists it to deep square-leg.
swing and a miss. Omar, suddenly, against the run of the play, opts for a cut against a short of length delivery outside off, and misses.
boucer on the middle and off stump line, Omar is surprised and goes down in a hurry to evade.
slower one, just outside off stump, Omar wants to run it down to third man but ends up squirting it to backward point
full and outside off stump, Omar lunges forward and lets it go
good length ball on off, driven crisply to cover
fuller length this time, driven forcefully again but can't get the timing. Straight to mid-off
crackling square cut from Tamim, slightly short from Franklin and Tamim stands up tall and drills it through the cover fielders. Stand and deliver stuff from Tamim
fuller and Tamim goes rips a scorching drive but Hamish Marshall dives full length to his left and pulls off a fine save at cover. That was headed straight to the fence but Marshall cuts it off

Streaky but Bangladesh will take it. Tamim down the ground, like he loves doing against the faster men. He doesn't get to the pitch of the ball and pokes tentatively but a thick inside edge races away past the stumps for another four.
driven to cover but can't get the placement or timing
back of a length on off, Tamim pushes tentatively to the off side
steered to third man for a single. Point tries to cut it off but can't stop the batsmen from completing a run
full ball outside off, Omar opens the face of the bat, past a fine gully for a single. Third man does the mopping up
tucked away to the legg side but they decide against the single

Ouch. Tamim charges down the ground again and Oram follows him well. Tamim doesn't get the room to slash and takes a blow on his chest. Ball trickles back to the bowler but Tamim gets back to the crease in time
steered to the off side but straight to point
full and outside off, Omar is quick to get on to the front foot, drives to cover
beaten. In the channel outside off and Omar has a poke.
fullish, on the leg and middle, Omar works it past square-leg
full and outside off, turned to point
on the legs, Oram tries to work it to on side, doesn't make contact and instead.. they get a leg bye
goes back, opens the bat-face, steers it to third man
length-delivery angling in, pushed to the off side, Tamim wants a run but sees Oram rushing to the ball and retreats.
And again.
super yorker, on the middle stump line, Tamim digs it out. Again it's Oram who makes the stop.
Hello! Hello! Tamim breaks free with a smokin shot.  He talkes the right foot out of the line and swings it across, over midwicket.
He charges down the track, backing away to the leg side, Oram slips in a slower one, Tamim adjusts, dabs it to point
full and on the off and middle line, steered to point
edged through the vacant slip region. Full and outside off and Omar goes for thrash.
beaten this time. Similar delivery and Omar pushes at it.
changes the length. Hits the short of length, it kicks up chest-high, on the middle, Omar hops up, pats it to the on side
And he gets it just wide of that slip fielder. Edged past him.
Tamim is upping the ante. Again he takes out the front leg from the line and has a swing across the line. But he goes through it too hard and doens't get time it well. Will get a single though.
Another swing across the line, but there is deep midwicket in place and he will get a single
slower one and Omar is beaten initially but adjusts and swats the short of length delivery past square-leg
just over square-leg. Bouncer at the throat, Omar is hurried and tries to pull , gets a top edge and it bobs behind square-leg

Too cute for his own comfort. Tamim tries to scoop-paddle a length-delivery on the leg side, misses. His back feet is dragged out of the crease and McCullum takes out the bails. Was he in, was he out? They refer it to upstairs and verdict is out.
full and straight, on the middle stump, Aftab turns it to midwicket
almost drags it on. Aftab tries to leave a delivery outside off, is bit late in doing so and gets a inside-edge.
slanting across Omar who dabs it down to to the off side
short in length, angling away, Aftab defends it back down the track
edged past Fleming at slip. Full and slanting away, Aftab is sucked into a forward prod and Fleming dives but can't stop that.
again edged, this time to third man. Another one full and slanting away, Aftab pushes at it, bat well away from the body.
fuller, just outside off stump and Omar has a go at it and misses. Too much bottom-hand and he doesn't drive straight, the bat comes down in an angle and goes inside the line.
short in length, on the middle, worked to midwicket and they rush across for a quick single.
beaten. In the zone outside off stump, Omar leans forward and pushes inside the line. Beaten by the straightening of the delivery.
slightly short, just outside off and Omar cuts but straight to point.

Oram removes Omar who walks after nicking. He attempts another cut shot, too close for that, and he nicks it behind. The openers are gone. Two new batsman in and New Zealand are slowly taking control.
length-delivery coming in, defended on the front foot
full in length, around off stump, Saqib stabs at it and it rolls away to the off side
drifts in on the legs, tickled to left of short fine-leg for a single. One slip in place.
lands on a length, outside off stump, turns in slightly, pushed to cover
slightly short but that one was quicker through the air, punched past point
slow through the air - Vettori will keep mixing them up- on the off stump, defended on the front foot
slips down leg side, Aftab tries to flick, misses and it clips the thigh pad enroute to McCullum who goes up in appeal
leans forward to defend
beaten And so is McCullum. It should have been a regulation stuff for McCullum but it just went through his gloves. It was a length-delivery outside off and Saqibul tried to cut.
edges a drive down to third man
length-delivery outside off stump, played towards point
homing in on the off stump, Aftab gets behind the line and defends.
slower one. Slightly short in length and Aftab shapes to pull, is too early into his stroke, and is beaten.
ouch. Hit right on the helmet. Similar length but Oram cranks up the pace and this time Aftab is late on the pull shot.
floated on the middle and leg stump line, Aftab leans forward and swings it over midwicket. Not a swing actually.... more of a pick-up shot.
will get a single with a flick through square-leg
arm-ball, outside off stump, Saqibul goes back, turns it to point
swept from outside off. Vettori slows up the pace, gives it a little bit of air and Saqibul goes down on a bent knee and sweeps it past midwicket
loopy flighted delivery, slow through the air, Saqibul is beaten in the flight, adjusts to push it down to mid-off
quicker this time, slightly short in length and punched down the track. Vettori moves to his left quickly to make the stop.
Charge down the track and biffed on the up. Aftab didn't lose his balance, the head was pretty still and he hit the length-delivery on the up, past the bowler.
Oram responds with a slower one. Aftab nudges it to towards cover, wants a single but is wisely sent back
slower bouncer. Again Aftab is early into the stroke and is beaten. Will the next one be a fast bouncer?
Almost holed up to the Big Pete at deep midwicket. Short and fast and Aftab goes for the pull shot. Fulton rushes in but it falls just short of him
full-pitched on the off stump line, driven crisply but straight to short cover
outside off, full, and it keeps a tad low, Saqibul tries to cut but is beaten by the lack of bounce.
tossed-up, drifts in the air, on the middle and leg, placed towards midwicket
quicker, outside off stump, cut to short third man. They will get a single out of a overthrow from Patel, the substitute.
full and on the off and middle, driven to long off
loopy flighted one, slow through the air, Saqibul is down the track but is made to wait for that one and ends up pushing it down the track
length-delivery, on the off stump line, guided past point.
fuller and outside off stump, pushed to point
slow yorker, dug out to the on side.
faster, on the middle and leg, turned behind square-leg and they run hard to come back for the second run.
length-delivery, on the middle and off stump line, pushed down the track
slower one, full in length, turned to the on side
quickish one on the off, worked to midwicket
slow through the air this time, driven to cover.
slow through the air, punched back down the track
floated on the middle, driven down to long on
really slow in the air, on the off stump line, pushed to the off side
nagging line, on the middle, merely pushed back to the bowler
slightly slow in the air, on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
quicker but ends up slipping down the leg side, Aftab has a swing and miss and it clips the thigh pad and runs down to fine leg
on the middle and leg, lapped around the corner
cheeky, cheeky! Saqibul gets well outside the line of offstump and paddles a god length delivery around the corner to fine leg
fuller outside off stump, he gets to the pitch and drives into the covers
dropped it slightly short outside off, cut away to the off side for a single
Vettori bowling round the wicket to the right-hander. Flighted ball on middle, defended down the ground
slightly looped up outside off, deflected to the off-side gap for a quick single
fired into off, over the wicket to the left-hander. Saqib cuts it but can't get the timing, under-edge goes to the off-side and they managed a single
driven down the ground confidently. Single to mid-off

Flighted outside off, Saqib down the ground and whips it off his pads for a single to square leg. They think of two but Hamish Marshall, running in from short midwicket, is too quick to take such a risk
good length ball, nice and straight. That's how Styris likes to keep them. Driven down the ground for a single to mid-off

Got 'em. Aftab tries to shift gears but can't get the timing. Good length ball on off, lofted drive but gets under the ball. Manages elevation but no distance. Ball balloons up to long-on where Mark Gillespie (the substitute fielder) completes a well-judged catch over his head. He got under the ball but realised he had probably over-run it but latched on to it well in the end. Another poor shot from Aftab. Coach Dav Whatmore slaps the table in frustration
Patted away to shot third man
short ball, pulled away to short midwicket for a single
full ball on off, driven through cover for a single
full on off again, driven through cover for another single. Time to rebuilt yet again
drifts in on to the middle and leg, Bashar pushes forward, the ball beats the prod and thuds in to the pad
And again. This time he went back
leans forward, defends, gets the inner-edge to the on side
nice flighted delivery that turned after landing outside off, stabbed away
leans forward, works a length-delivery to the on side.
on the off stump line, defended on the off side
fullish, on the leg and middle, left foot comes across a touch but he arrests that movement, turns it to the on side
leans forward and defends
flicks a delivery slipping on the leg side.
off cutter, on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
slightly short and outside off, cut to deep point
tossed-up outside off stump and Saqibul leans across and sweeps it from there
drifts in the air but ends up slipping down the leg side. Wide called. Vettori is not impressed.
gets a single with a drive to sweeper cover
lands on a length, turns in from outside off, dabbed to the on side
quicker, slightly short and outside off, cut to deep point
comes down the track to a flighted delivery and pushes it back to the bowler
full in length, outside off, Saqibul drives but goes too hard at it and the ball just rolls over.
full and straight, Saqibul stays adjacent to the line and drives to long off
lands on a length, on the middle, slides in, worked to midwicket
fullish, on the middle, driven uppishly through mid-on, down to long-on
on the off and middle, Saqibul eases it down to long-off.
Short in length and Bashar bashes it past square-leg. A very well placed pull shot.
well tossed-up, outside off and again Saqibul opts for a sweep shot.

nice one. It drifted in the air and curved in. Bashar is surprised by the amount of the in-drift, takes out the left leg from the line in a hurry and jabs it away. lovely bit of variation from Vettori

Another one goes down. It was short  and outside off and it was cut past backward point. Oram gets across from deep point and fires in a direct hit. It was lethal and fatal. Bashar was caught short of the crease.
on the off stump line, driven back to the bowler. He was beaten in the flight.
floated on the middle and off, defended on the front foot
comes in from outside off, pushed carefully back down the track
full and outside off, driven to long-off
full and straight, Ashraful drives, bat comes outside the line a touch and he gets a inner-edge, past midwicket
full-pitched outside off, driven straight to cover
length-delivery, outside off, driven on the up, to deep cover
short and outside off, cut to right of widish third man. Bond makes the stop and this time they settle for just a single
overpitched outside off, driven uppishly through mid-off

He doesn't waste any time, cleans up Saqibul Hasan rightaway. Full, straight, on the middle stump and Saqibul drives all around it and the  middle stump is pegged back. What Mikey Holding refers as , "If you miss, I hit delivery"
short in length, on the middle and leg, waist-high, tapped to the on side
from wide of the crease, fullish, just outside off stump, Rahim gets behind the line, pushed it to cover
well outside the off stump, Rahim lets it fly past him
Another one. Bond has the licence to kill. Pitched on off and hit off. Fab delivery. Rahim pushes inside the line and the off stump has been disturbed.
almost caught and bowled. Full in length, on the off and middle, a check-drive and it flies past the outstretched left-hand of a diving McMillan
leans forward, pushes a length-delivery to cover
on a length, outside off stump, defended on the front foot
fuller, on the leg and middle, flicked past square-leg
full, fast and outside off. Mortaza is beaten, pushing inside the line. You can almost  feel the pressure the batsmen are under as Bond rushes in.
screaming bouncer this time. Mortaza quickly ducks under.
Follows the bumper with a yorker. It kisses past the outside edge and the off stump.
beaten again. Full-pitched, in the zone outside off and Mortaza is beaten, pushing inside the line. The heat is on.
length-delivery, homing in on the off stump, pushed to point

again beaten. Mortaza struggling against Bond. He would like to give it back when he comes for a bowl. Outside off stump and Mortaza almost sleepwalks into a edgy drive. It teases the outside edge and oohs and aahs from McCullum
leans forward and defends

drags it on. The seventh wicket is down. Bangladesh are fading away here. A slow off cutter, outside off stump, Ashraful shapes to late-cut it , the ball breaks in, collides with the edge and rushes on to the stumps.
slides away from Rafique who shoulders arms
short in length, outside off stump, Rafique stabs it away to the on side
fuller, outside off, square-driven to point

beaten. Another off cutter, on the middle and off stump line and it moves away, past the outside edge and dangerously close to the off stump. Again Rafique, like Ashraful, was trying to cut it. Risky stroke.
streaky edge past second slip. He is bit late in coming forward and ends up playing well ahead of the body and will get a single down to third man
full in length, on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
full and straight, on the middle, worked to midwicket
bouncer, outside off stump, swayed away from the line
full in length, outside off stump, Rafique drives but is late on it and gets a inside-edge to fine leg
yorker, on the off stump line, dug out to the off side.
Rafique da sends it soaring over long-on. Super strike. A slow off cutter and Rafique leant forward and swung it cleanly. Up .. up ... and over.
on the off stump line, dabbed to the off side
slightly short in length, outside off, cut to point
fuller, on the off stump line, driven to sweeper cover
offcutter on the middle and off stump line, nudged to the on side.
off cutter, breaks in from outside off, Mortaza leans forward to defend. He has been quiet so far. Letting Rafique do the talking.
length-delivery, on the middle stump line, defended to the on side
nice slower one. Full in length. Rafique picked it late but did well to keep it away from the stumps.
Another slower one, Rafique spots it early this time and lofts it over mid-on
full, faster, on the middle stump line, inside-edged to square-leg
rushes through the channel outside off stump, left alone
Another batsman falls, chopping it on to the off stump. Offcutter that landed outside off stump and broke in, Mortaza pushed at it, bat away from the body, and got a fatal inside-edge.
lands on a length, around off and middle, turned to point
Styris picks his fourth wicket. Full and outside off stump, Razzak goes for a lofted drive but ends up ballooning it over mid-off. Mark Gillespie, the sub, moves across to take it.
Full and on the leg and middle stump line, Rafique goes down on a bent knee and swings it over deep midwicket. That was one lusty hit.
almost cleaned him up. Quite similar to the delivery that was dismissed for a six. Rafique went for one almighty swing across the line, missed and it bounded off McCullum's pad
slower one, on the legs, flicked past square-leg
length-delivery, lands on the leg stump, moves towards off, pushed to cover
fuller, faster, on the off and middle stump line, Rasel is a touch late in getting the bat down, manages to keep it out though.
overpitched on the off stump line, driven to right of mid-off
Rafique continues to fight. Short of length and outside off stump and he slashed it over the slips
lands outside legstump, goes straight on and strikes him on the pad outside leg stump. Still McCullum appeals. These wicketkeepers ... I tell you....
on the middle stump line, worked to cover
fuller, slower in pace, defended down the track
dropped by McCullum. A tough chance. Full in length, outside off stump and Rasel edged a drive and it brushed the gloves and ran away to the boundary.
similar delivery, slower through the air, left alone
another slower one. anothe off cutter, Rafique stays back, turns it behind square-leg to retain the strike.
slow through the air, well outside off stump, dabbed down to short third man
quite similar in pace and trajectory, Rafique backs away to cut, top-edges it but gets it down to left of short third man
beaten outside off
quicker one, on the off stump line, Rasel is surprised by the change in pace, gets his bat down in a hurry, jabs it away to the off side
floated on the middle and leg stump line, Rafique tries to sweep, misses and it runs off the pad
slightly short and just outside off, cut to deep point
fuller, from round the stumps, wristed through square-leg
wide down the leg side. This is the second wide of the innings.
overpitched outside off, driven down the ground for a single
imperious. Slightly short in length and outside off stump, Rafique just leant over and lapped it over midwicket.
homing in on the off stump, defended on the front foot. Rasel has been batting quite sensibly, giving support to Rafique.
full-pitched on the middle and leg, driven to long-on
Rafique will retain the strike with a drive to long-off.
full and on the middle, Rafique wanted to sweep but inside-edges it to the on side
low full toss, shovelled through the on side for a single
slow through the air, outside off, Rasel is beaten while trying to cut
faster, fuller, driven to mid-off
fullish, outside off stump and Rafique backs away to drill it to sweeper cover.
leans forward to derend the last delivery. Rafique will be on strike. This is sensible cricket from these two. Pity, that some of the other batsmen couldn't do it.
full and on the legs, flicked away for a single
full in length, on the middle and off, driven back to the bowler. Oram is bowling round the stumps.
That's the end. Oram removes Rasel with a yorker. Rasel drives all over it and the leg stump is pegged back. But it was a pretty handy partnership. 34 runs.

inn2.comm: Full in the channel outside off, left alone
Wide outside off stump.
on the middle and leg stump line, turned straight to square-leg
fullish, just outside off stump, Fulton leans forward, defends to cover
rushes through the channel outside off, Fulton leans forward, covers the off stump and shoulders arms
short of length, outside off stump, goes on straight, Fulton gets across, punches it to point
full-pitched on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
full and outside off, Fulton leans forward, drives to mid-off
lands outside off stump, stays there, left alone
pushes that wide outside off stump, wide called.
full in length, just outside the off stump, driven to cover
again pushes that one outside off. He is yet to curve it back in.
edged to third man boundary. Fullish and slanting away, Fulton leans forward, pushes at it and edges it well past the second slip. All along the ground though.
full in length, outside off stump, Fulton leans forward, drives to cover
tip and run. He pushes it towards mid-off and knew immediately that there was a single in it
fullish, outside off stump, driven straight to cover
drags back the length. Hits short of length, keeps it outside off, punched to cover.
nice probing delivery outside off, full in length, shapes away a touch, Fulton lets that one go past him.
short in length, around the off stump line, pushed back to Mortaza.
fuller, on the middle and leg stump line, turned to square-leg
On the off stump line, Fleming leans forward, pushes it to that short cover
wide down the leg side.
well outside the off stump, Fleming thrusts his right foot forward and shoulders arms
angling in towards the off stump, Fleming stretches well forward, defends to short cover.
And again.
full and outside off, square-driven to point
leans forward, caresses a length-delivery on the middle stump, straight down the ground.
slap. He thrusted his front foot forward and smashed a length-delivery outside off and carved it past point.
almost holed up to mid-off. Fleming leant forward, swung across the line, but edged it to length-delivery over Bashar at mid-off
lemon-cut. Back of length, outside off stump, Fleming goes for a drive, on the up, and inside-edges it past the stumps
Easy pickings. Full and the legs and Fleming leans forward, flicks cripsly past square-leg
full in length, outside off stump, pushed to cover
Overpitched outside off, driven to cover.
slower one, full and on the leg and middle, pushed to right of mid-on
leans forward and defends.
full, hint of outswing, Fleming drives powerfully but straight to short cover
length-delivery, outside off stump, Fleming gets on to the front foot, opens the bat-face, runs it past backward point.
full and straight, on the off and middle, defended back down the track
short of length, played towards mid-on and they pinch a run
short in length, from round the stumps, angling in, Fleming gets forward, eases it through midwicket
short in length, on the middle stump line, Big Pete imposes himself on it: gets forward, stands tall and punches it on the up, down the ground. Eye-catching stroke.
length-delivery on the off has been pushed back to the bowler
short in length, on the stumps, placed towards mid-on for a single
Even better than the previous one. It was again short in length, outside off stump, Fulton eased forward, got on top of the bounce and punched on the up, through cover
No lemons or chinese involved in this. Leans forward to a full-pitched delivery and creams it through extra cover.
just short of drivabel length, outside off, pushed to cover
leans forward to defend
full in length, on the middle stump line, Fleming tries to wrok it to onside, gets a leading edge towards mid-off.
faster, on the off and middle stump line, pushed to cover
fuller, dug out, back to the bowler
lands on the leg stump line, turns, Fulton wants to spear it through on side and gets a leading edge.
slipping down leg side, Fulton shapes to flick, I think he missed it and it bounded off the pad to Bashar at backward short leg who dives to his right but palms it off.
leans forward, drives to left of mid-off
full in length, driven to mid-on
Gone! Rasel takes out Fulton. Full in length, angling away, Fulton drove across the line and skies a dolly to mid-on. Rasel pumps his fist in delight.
full-pitched, outside off stump, run down to third man
leans forward, defends to cover
leans forward to defend.
drifts on the leg and middle stump line, Marshall goes back and doesn't conect with his intended flick shot. The ball thuds into the pad, they go up in appeal but it was going down leg side
this time he is successfull and will get a single behind square-leg
floated outside off stump, Fleming jabs at it and is beaten
turning down leg side, glanced to short fine leg
lands outside off, turns in, Fleming eases forward to defend

almost a mix-up. Pushed towards point and they both set off for a run. Fleming pulls out after few steps down the track, Marshall is almost stranded. But Aftab fails to pick the ball up and Marshall escapes.
single down to third man
full-pitched on the middle stump line, driven to mid-on
short in length, outside off stump, slashed to point
full in length, Fleming drives to mid-on, wants a run but he had hit that little too powerfully and he retreats
low full toss, flicked to long leg. 50 up for New Zealand.
tossed up on the off stump line, Fleming leans forward and lofts it between the bowler and mid-on.
flighted delivery, on the off stump line, driven through cover
quick single with a push towards mid-off
on the middle and leg, turned past square-leg
leans forward, drives to long on
full in length, outside off stump, defended on to the front foot
length-delivery, angling away from Marshall who guides it to point
full in length, on the middle, driven to mid-on
tapped close on the off side and rushes across for a quick single. Aftab screams in and again doesn't pick the ball . Hmm....
full-pitched on the middle stump line, pushed with soft hands, towards mid-on
slower one, on the off stump line, guided to point
flighted up, outside off stump, driven through cover
on the off stump line, driven to mid-off

cuts but mistimes it. The ball rolls to the off side and they decide to pinch a run. Rahim, takes the gloves off, rushes to the ball and fires in a throw at non-striker's end but misses. Had it hit it could have got very interesting. Fleming has been run-out a few times in this WC
short and outside off, cut to point
leans forward, taps a fullish delivery to the off side
length-delivery on the off stump, defended on the front foot.
slips down the leg side, Fleming leans forward, flicks it behind square. Easy.
Full in length, outside off, driven to point
leans forward, places the delivery to cover point
overpitched outside off, driven straight to cover
on the middle stump line, driven to mid-on
on the middle stump line, driven back to the bowler
leans forward, tucks a fullish delivery past midwicket
slightly short, flat, Marshall backs away and cuts it to deep point
turns in from outside off, turned to the on side
slips down the leg side, Fleming tries to sweep but misses
Overpitched outside off stump, driven crisply through cover. Easy on the eye.
on a length, just outside off stump, driven to cover.

shout for lbw. from round the stumps, lands outside off stump and slides in. Fleming leans forward, pushes at it, the ball evades the waft and thuds into the pad. It looked like it was going down leg side. The hawk eye suggests it would have clipped the leg stump

Fab shot. Quite a similar delivery but Fleming makes contact this time. Just leant forward and caressed it straight down the track. on the up.  There is a mis-field near the ropes and he will get a boundary.
flatter and quicker, on the off stump line, slightly short in length and Marshall goes back to cut to backward point
goes back to a delivery drifting on to the leg and middle, flicks it behind square-leg
leans forward, works a flighted delivery on the off stump line to midwicket
50 up  for Fleming. 49th ODI fifty and the fifth in WCs. Equalling Martin Crowe's record, the most 50s by a New Zealand captain in WC. A drive to right of mid-on.
dropped but a very tough chance. Marshall drives uppishly towards mid-on, the fielder jumps, gets a hand to it but ends up palming it.
straight one on the middle stump line, flicked past square-leg
on the middle stump line, leans forward, drives towards widish mid-on
drifts down the leg side. Wide called.
slipping on to the legs, tucked away behind square-leg
tossed-up, on the middle stump line, Fleming leans forward and drives down the ground. Pure timing. Nonchalantly played. Classy.
leans forward, opens the bat-face, guides it towards backward point
on the off stump line, driven through cover
drifts on to the leg stump, flicked away behind square-leg. New Zealand in complete control here. The partnership has reached 49.
50 of the partnership is up. Landed on the middle and off, turned, pushed towards cover point and they complete the quick run.
yet another single. This time, with a square-drive past point
comes down the track, on-drives a fullish delivery, to wide mid-on
well flighted delivery and he pushed it outside off, Fleming reaches out and slices it through backward point
full and on the middle and leg stump line, nudged to midwicket
arm-ball, on the middle and leg, turned towards square-leg
similar delivery, this time pushed in front of square and he will get a run
slightly short in length, slow through the air, Fleming is on the front foot, is made to wait and he pushes it to the on side
fuller and driven to long on. 100 up for NZ. They need a further 75 to win.
on the off stump line, Marshall will retain the strike with a drive to long-off. It's all looking rather easy for NZ at the moment. Can Bangladesh pull off a minor miracle?
patted away to the off side for a single
driven wide of mid-on for a single
full ball on middle, faster one, pushed down the ground
pushed to long-off for a single
flighted on off, Fleming takes a long stride forward and defends it confidently
down the ground and turned away to midwicket for a single. Four of the over and Fleming eases along
down the ground again and tucked away to midwicket, batsmen complete a couple
on-driven for a single
down the ground and patted away back to the bowler
uses his feet again, this time firmly driven to long-off for a single
Waltzes down the track and smoothly drives past mid-off for a neat four. Mid-off dives across but can only dive over the ball. Pendulum smooth swing of the bat from Fleming
tapped back to the bowler
Charges down the ground again and tries to loft it over mid-on, can't time it well and thickish edge flies to deep midwicket. Batsmen pick up a brace
Down the ground again, fired into his pads but he gets hold of this one, lofting it to midwicket and scampering three.
driven to mid-on, slower through the air and Fleming can't time it well enough
Too easy now. Flighted outside off and Fleming simply goes on his knees and swats it over midwicket for a six. Fielder tries to get under it but all he can do is watch.
Down the track again but can't get the timing right this time, slashed away for a single
driven to long-on for a single. Expensive over for Bangladesh, 13 from it
Fired down the leg side, Marshall misses and Mushfiqur can't reach there either. Ball races away to the fine-leg fence for four
defended back to the bowler
flat trajectory drifting on to leg stump, Marshall walks across and flicks it through square leg
off stump line, Fleming leans forward and pushes it through cover point for a single
Marshall takes a step down the pitch and defends it back to Rafique
he comes down the track again and this time plays it to midwicket
short and wide outside the off stump, Marshall cuts and gets an edge that runs wide of the wicketkeeper for four
driven down to long on for a single
full toss, Marshall steps down the track and lofts it over extra cover
Marshall gives Saqibul the charge again an dswats him over mid-off, the ball falls safe of the fielder on the fence
Fleming plants his front foot forward and slog-sweeps it powerfully over the midwicket fence
Huge hit. Fleming has a shimmy down the track and unfurls a swing over midwicket. It soars way over the ropes. Fleming is in a real hurry here.
beaten in the flight and almost drives to the bowler. It just falls short.
full and on the middle and leg stump line, driven to right of long on. Fleming on strike.
flat and on the middle and leg, flicked past square-leg.
arm-ball, on the off stump, Marshall backs away, the ball hastens towards the off stump and he brings his bat down in time and dabs it to right of short third man
slightly short in length, Fleming opens the bat-face and late cuts to short third man. Another quick single.

slow through the air, Marshall is down the track, drives to left of long-on and they run hard to come back for the second. Had the throw hit the sticks, Fleming would have been a goner. Another run out chance missed.
will retain the strike with a push towards square-leg
short and outside off, cut straight to point
slips down the leg side. He pushed that one through quicker and lost control in the process
flat and on the leg and middle, bunted past square-leg
Fleming is peppering the cow corner. Tossed up outside off and he slog swept it, high in the air, in that region between deep midwicket and long on
moves to 96 with a thrash to widish long on. one hit away from the landmark
Fleming gets his eight ODI hundred. Also reaches 1000 runs in World Cup games. Take a bow Stephen Fleming. Full, on the middle and leg, he went down on a bent knee and slog-swept it to long leg.
on the leg and middle, worked through square-leg
slightly short in length, on middle and leg, flicked to deep midwicket for a single
Marshall finishes the game off with a biggie. Down he went on his knee and disposed a flighted delivery over deep midwicket.
